data.message: Thought Facebook would of been useful, but not anymore. Stupid messager -.- 😡 😪

replies.message: We're working hard to improve the Messenger experience for everyone, Richard. If there's something that we could do to improve your experience, please let us know at: http://on.fb.me/1wS2Slu. -Sarah
You look like a child molester
How about allowing messenger to be an option!

Facebook sure, one little thing - kill messenger, I want one app, i don't need 2,3,4,X apps one for sharing photo, one for status, another for messages - in my country, paper app is not available in store - WHY? you force mi to use messenger and main fb app - WHY? i am not doing that, will not use messages, and if you keep forcing me to use messenger, i am done with your main app as well...
